strategy: Craftworld Eldar armies have a Strategy Rating of 4. Craftworld Ulthwé are also subject to the 'Seers of Ulthwé' special rule.
Initiative: Ulthwé Warhosts, Ulthwé Support Warhosts, Aspect Warriors, Titans and the Avatar formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Eldar Craftworld Ulthwé.

formations.name: 1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

formations.name: Black Guardian Warhost
extraUnits: Replace up to three Eldar Guardians with an equal number of Eldar Heavy Weapon Platform units: Free
Replace up to three Eldar Guardians with Support Weapons Platforms (all armed with the same weapon): 25 points each
Add up to three Eldar Wraithlords: 50 points each

formations.name: Mounted Black Guardian Warhost
formations.units: Two Farseers, six Eldar Guardians and four Wave Serpents
extraUnits: Replace up to three Eldar Guardians with an equal number of Eldar Heavy Weapon Platform units: Free
Replace any number of Wave Serpents with two Falcons each: 50 points each
Replace one Wave Serpent with two Firestorms: 75 points

sections.name: Ulthwé Support Warhosts
sections.description: Up to one Ulthwé Support Warhosts for each Ulthwé Warhost taken

formations.name: Black Guardian Windriders
extraUnits: Replace up to six Eldar Jetbikes with Vypers: Free

sections.name: Ulthwé Line Troupes
sections.description: Up to one Ulthwé Line Troupes for each Ulthwé Warhost or Ulthwé Support Warhost taken

formations.name: Aspect Warrior Troupe
formations.units: Six Aspect Warrior units chosen from the following: Dark Reapers, Dire Avengers, Fire Dragons, Howling Banshees, Shining Spears, Striking Scorpions, Swooping Hawks, Warp Spiders. The formation may not mix aspects.

formations.name: Engines of Vaul
formations.units: One Engine of Vaul chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent
extraUnits: Add up to two additional Engines of Vaul (Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent): 200 points each

formations.name: Rangers
extraUnits: Add one Eldar Rangers unit: 25 points

formations.name: Swords of Vaul
extraUnits: Replace up to two Falcons with Firestorms: Free

sections.name: Ulthwé Aircraft, Spacecraft and Titans
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

upgrades.title: Ulthwé Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

items.name: 0-1 Seer Council
items.description: Replace one Farseer with a Seer Council.
